channel.title: CVE Feed for The Dracut Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Dracut Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-8637|2024-08-06T02:27:41.222Z -- the%20dracut%20project -- dracut
item.description: A local information disclosure issue was found in dracut before 045 when generating initramfs images with world-readable permissions when 'early cpio' is used, such as when including microcode updates. Local attacker can use this to obtain sensitive information from these files, such as encryption keys or credentials.
